verses.roman:
āliṅgana kari' tāṅre balila vacana
tumi pāṇḍu, pañca-pāṇḍava--tomāra nandana

synonyms: āliṅgana kari'-embracing; tāṅre—unto him; balila—said; vacana—those words; tumi—you; pāṇḍu—were Pāṇḍu; pañca—five; pāṇḍava—the Pāṇḍavas; tomāra—your; nandana—sons.
translation: Embracing Rāya Bhavānanda, the Lord declared to him, "You formerly appeared as Pāṇḍu, and your five sons appeared as the five Pāṇḍavas."
